basics.name: Joshua Constantino
basics.label: Computer Programmer
basics.summary: Computer Programmer for the City and County of Honolulu, Emergency Services Division

courses: ICS111: Intro to Computer Science I
ICS141: Discrete Math for CS I
ICS211: Intro to Computer Science II

work.company: Department of Information Technology, City and County of Honolulu
highlights: Ensure that computer systems are up-to-date
Repair system problems in an effective and timely manner
Adapt to new systems and implementation of systems

work.company: Department of Defense, National Security Innovation Network
highlights: Created a web application to optimize flight scheduling for the 25th Infantry Division
Coordinated with 25th Infantry Division to further optimize the web application
Properly prepare, pack and sort guest orders for shipment using correct materials
Meet guest order promise times to deliver on the guest demand
Took lead of the team in the absence of the team's direct and executive leadership

volunteer.summary: Recorded the AFJROTC unit of Moanalua High School participating in the event
highlights: Walked to raise awareness of suicide prevention

awards.title: Distinguished Graduate

summary: Demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the unit, school, and country
